Posts.Content: Ter wrote: just wanted you guys to know im out of hospital, and trying to recoop by drinking lots of H20 due to they zapped the stone which was huge, a wk in hosp was not fun, as i thought they had to puncture my kidney like last time but no, they zapped it, now i have to flush all the sand etc out.. i did have to do my own surgery this week at the urologist office as he made me take out my own stint, oy vey, i dont have a strong tummy as even a bandaide when my son was little i couldnt deal wth, but the doc made me go to the bathroom and showed me how to pull it out, OUCH, as it was over 2 ft long and looked like a curly cue from a telephone which came out of my uretha....so im still resting and drinking plenty. just wanted you guys ot know what was going on.. also i did see this past week my onc, and when he asked about where my dh was, as he was in hospital, he looked so sad 'yes the onc", as he said he wanted to do more test etc on me, but he said he would not do that to me under all the stress and ailments i am under right now..oh he does have a heart..and i had taken my cousin as he also had cancer of lung and survivor of 16 years with same onc..and it was good for both to see each other...plus my cousin he's a bit diff but a heart of gold, he took notes for me, somethig i wasnt expecting, so that made mefeel good...and i will schedule those test when overall I am emotionally capable of them, as my onc knows i am on palliative care but want to know where i am at w/my cancer. well you heard this from the horses mouth.. and i am so so sorry for all the girls we lost since i have not been on line... also, my email is stuck and i cant get it to go home.... love and hugs and thanks for all the thoughts and prayers. hugs Ter It's better to be effective than it is to be right.- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: im still around Ter faeriesong

Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2008 04:46AM Ter wrote: Thanks you guys for good thoughts, I really appreciate it. While prior to finally doing the kidney surgery, I had had a bad tooth ache in 2 lower teeth, ouch, and many other infections, which at the time I was put on some heavey antibiotics, I was at the point w/kidney, that if I ddidnt do something about it, id loose my kidney, so that antibiotic and me, well it was at the point all I could do was heave me guts out and of course my diarrhea, as I couldn't eat etc...so they changed antibiotic to keflex, then off to hosp...well didn't have chance to take it, as they had me on about 2 drip ones iny IV and 2 by mouth...well that's over, and now its 4AM Tuesday and im stil up, sorry for typos as I don't have my glasses on and all by myself as yesterday morning poor DH was so bad, we called the doc and he wanted him in the hosp for help, which he is there now, as a good friend of his took him, as he had packed a little bag as were not sure how long he will be there.... And now my tooth ache came back 10 fold to the point I cant even try to brush my teeth let alone move my tounge and sip water..I even used ambasol, yuck and it doesn't work, tried eating applesauce and plain white bread w/peanut butter as I know its got protein, as caloriess I don't care as past 2 wks ive dropped now more than 10 pounds, I just cant win, and ready to give up on all...and I cant even cry, as muy whole side of face and under the neck area of mouth is a B! Im calling dentist in morning if I wake up and ask if they will put me on Z pack as that's the only one that seems to work on me, not strong but it's a short regime, and it works, so I hope she does as suzie is coming here on Wed and wants me to have an appt w/dentist, and not sure if I will be ready for it..I know my body isn't, thank G*d its only down the road, and she can take me.... Just too many things going on here, and I hate to say it, but mom called today and she never calls, I call her the eveniings well I couldn't talk well and she's a sassy ole thing and she was asking all kinds of thibgs about dh and me and I really dobn ttell her everything , as I hate to worry her, but shes a mom and thinks she believes she has an MD at the end of her name lol..any way yea Im bitching as I tried to say something and it didn't come out quick enough as SOOO many things are going on here, our house is so cluttered and I don't care, and before I said a couple words she had an attitude and hung up ob me..no the phone line didn't get disconnected, as she would of called back...so after taking to my sis tonite, she said don't call her, as she upsets you too much and her age and with todays meds etc is very confusing to her, and I don't have the energy to try to explain...but she called tonite almost 9pm very late for her, and said "well whats going on"? dah, I let her know about Frank, and I hate it when someone "thibkis" they know so much more.. I then said I cant talk anymore, as I couldn't even had cared less, as yes im tryig so hard to take care of myself...I think im doing an aok job for just me......oh yea that antibiotic broke me out in a rash so bad between fingers toes legs etc, so I took a benedril..and just laying here tryig not to whollow in my own pitty. Im trying ladies but with no energy due to mouth and really weak.... I have started prayiing more, and and trying to recoop from hosp...as I have to get these piecees of sand out of my kidneym sounds easy? Nope, very hard, as drinking water is so hard and if I try to eat it causes the other end to act up , so my tush hurts...oy, what would I do without all you guys to vent on... BUT IM TRYING.. LOVE YOU ALL and your all so special to me. : ) TER

Posts.Content: Ter wrote: I hear and read sooo many diff treatments, meds, etc, and most I have not heard of, due to the fact I beleive my onc did not explain anything....prior to seeing an onc I was sent to a surgeon for a biopsy, then he told me I had BC 2 days later that was a thursday, then Monday I was in surgery, then surgeon told me to see this one onc., which I did when I was recooping, went straight to this onc who it seems like a good amt of us don't care for to well....who then told me I had to do chemo..and now in the shape Im in now. Id love to see maybe like a somewhat dictionary/encyclopedia so to say around this place that has some of these meds etc written and a bit of an explanation of what they know about it.  Sure we all have our own opinions etc of what worked for them and what didnt, but it would be "SOMETHING' myself or someone else might need. What do you gals think? As I believe the more you know the better off you'll be...as right now I am writing my notes for another appt for Monday to see my reg internist for these lumps and pains under my arm and on my chest wall of my fist masct.....and I leave spaces between each ? for an answer, and then when i get home at some time I write them down in my doc's where I wrote the questions at, and the dr and date etc. What do you ladies think of this? And yes Luanne I have quite a few meds we talked about on that list for Monday...thank you.  Ter It's better to be effective than it is to be right.- Log in to post a reply

Ter

Posts.Content: Mar 8, 2008 12:35AM Ter wrote: hi kimberely, well back in 04 when finally diag after this good size lump sat there and grew for 4-5 years i was finally diag...yea i did the chemo with all the meds in them, and during that time i did lots of research on rads...after doing that over and over and contemplation I decided NOT to do rads, and didnt even tell my onc till it was time to do them, as i knew he might try to talk me into it, and i did not want that to happen....... well lots of time has gone by and still no rads and sure i have mets, but I kind of think i would of had them anyway...but my onc, and other doc's involved all said they were shocked that i woudlnt do rads but they feel now that I did make a good choice for myself, maybe not everyones choices or needs but for me so far its been a good one for me..now if they could take all the pains away i think id be doing so much better.... and yes i did have my urologist visit today and he is unsure, asyes i have to have this kidney worked on, but i could hear it in his voice and the sound of his words that he was hesitant about it...as normally it would be normal, well for me, as my body produces stones alot, but not this way or kind...and im scarred that cancer has snuck in there, but I did have my aunt with me (moms sister) and then she took me to the hosptial for my pre-0p- for Tuesdays surgery...just not sure what time Im scheduled for, i call the nite before for the time to be their, and yes im sure he will keep me, as i have no one to look after me , so most likely they will keep me in there and then later I will be staying at my aunts house... Ter

Congrats!  very happy for you hugs, and I'm sipping my hot tea right now for you for a good toast! Ter

Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2008 04:57AM Ter wrote: she is a honey, please take good care of her, as they grow up soo fast..my baby of 26 comes by amost everyday to check on me and l look in fridge..he is doing well..he hates his profession that he has been in for 4 years , and apprenticeship program and works daily and school on sat's...he just purchased his frirst NEW motorcycle, not the first one as he has been riding dirt bikes since , well before he was 2 yrs old and in diapers.. now its the street bike the crotch rocket and he is so proud he did it on his own by not needing co signer etc..as all others were used but he's worked hard for it, and its awsome, its a dark deep periwinkle blue w/,metalic, the only one like it...so he is in heaven...like he said "hes in love"....doesnt want to marry or have kids, might change but i doubt it as he has a bad influence of his "real bio father" who downs women completely...very sad as he is sooo cute and sweet and compassionate, and a humor that wont end...i feel bad as he has no brothers sisters etc..and with me and dh the way we are and his bio father in and out of prisonm overall I think I did  a good job and give myself an "atta girl" every so often.... what is her name in the avatar...give her a squeeze on those cute  chubby cheeks.. hugs Ter

Posts.Content: Mar 6, 2008 12:40AM Ter wrote: Oh pooh, i wrote to tell you that i am scarred and frightened and it went two times on the board , so i deleted one of them and both were deleted.. Im scared due to i am going in for surgery this next Tuesday on my kidney....my urologist himmmed and hawwed when he heard i was a cancer patient....as i had have kidney surgery 4-5 times in my past, but this time its so different.... Normally I would feel a little scarred by hubby is hospitalized and with no known time when he is out...so its like im kind of by myself,  I do have my cousin and my aunt moms sister who will probably take me..and my mom said she would be there and drive there, oh no, as she cant, but said she can for me, oh man what a mom will do for her child, but she still has her drivers lic and is active but she is in a wheel chair after her stroke, but i think her sis will be taking her, lets hope so....mom is very worried about me, and so am I... at this time i have no one to care for me when i get out, last time this happened w/my kidney i was in hosp  one month, lets hope this doesnt happen this time, as this time it feels so different adn my urologist hadnt known that i have cancer and mets to my hip, so he is himmming and hawing, and talking to my onc and my reg family dr. i will get back to you when i get home..as tomorow i see my onc, then friday i see my urologist to see what he may have to do with me in surg...he in my eyes wont know til he is in there, last time he had to puncture my kidney behind with a big hole and had to stop due to me blood clotting inside and he couldnt see anything more and didnt want to puncture somehing....til it cleared of clots about 1 week later.. just wanted you to know. hugs Ter
Posts.Title: Im frightened. Ter Traci-----TripNeg

Posts.Content: Oct 7, 2012 08:44AM Ter wrote: Jenlee, Hi I'm Ter, very old here, but havent been on BC.org for years, but decided to check it out as now they find I have skin cancer, and very scarred...Plus with wanting to put lotion etc on my dry skin (everywhere), I found out through the years, when like Bath and Beauty, those kind of places, where everything smells so good, Id go crazy..NOW Im cleaning out ALL that stuff, as I purchased enough for gifts as w/75% off good idea, but that doesnt solve your or my situation/problem....I boxed up and giving my healthy friends full bottles etc., also my sister took some home in WA state when here.  As I want to use only ONE product on my whole body except my face, thats a diff story....I looked last night in ULTA.com and went into moisturizers, and they have their product and if you want to know more about it, they have 2 notations, one: read what someone else says about their likes/dislikes about that specific one, and another which you can put your own reply of using it.... I had way too many, which was one thing, as I love cosmetics, well basically eye shadows, and my face looks great, but my body is like a dried old aligator.  Im going to try like Nivia, and other regular lotions you see on the drug store isle..No more fu fu places for me, as if I want to smell good, I'll take a shower and use the lotion/cream all over, and for a scent besides being clean, use like the Nieva, Eucerin. Im so new to this BCorg Im not sure where I would post my situation on skin cancer...also after a long battle with dr not telling me things on my BC and sending me in circles the BC spread and they ended up waiting 5 years til they did a FNA, thats when I was actually diag..when I told my doc in 99 I had a lump, and saw my doc every month due to other things like fibromyalgia. If you find something before I do, please let me know, hope I could be of a bit of help, and I also wanted to ask you those ?s re: skin cancer, as I need to go in and be biopsied on TONS of these things I have had for years, and my onc sent me to the dermatologist which is in the cancer center...but I have been so chicken I keep canceling my appts...as all I can think of is them using tiny cookie cutters and pushing them into my skin, then twisting them out...been thru so much everyone tells me, this should be easy...but Im so scarred. Take care and be safe hugs Ter

Posts.Content: Oct 1, 2008 02:04AM Ter wrote: Oh Janis, You have such a cute little face, oh, I know you remember last time, and you were adorable , yes even bald...so many of us think we need to cover our noggins, and some really want to due to work or what ever, but there are other ways IF you want to cover your little head, especially with your neck of the woods and fall time here and winter coming with the snow you get, so you have all the reasons to wear a cute hat, as they keep the warmth in as i know you love making snow angels...I have a pic of you in my scrapbook when yours was just growing out, and your so cute with it like that...it was around Xmas time, as the decorations around you...take a look at your photos of last time, your a cutie pie lady. lots of hugs Ter

Posts.Content: Mar 6, 2008 08:10AM Ter wrote: Dear all of you wonderful ladies, Im glad you loved my beautiful quilt.. when times get lonley I wrap it around me and feel your presence, so lately its the only thing around me, as dear hubby is hospitalized, and not know for how long. Im trying to rest, eat a little, and trying to drink more than i should. Yes I am scarred, as i see my onc tomorrow and urologist friday, as next tuesday I am going in for surgery on my kidney, and G*d forbid it turn out like last time, of puncturing my kidney in the back and a month in hospital. oh dressmaker, i do have to say a personal thank you for my quilt you are so talented...I do need to wash it, and can i just throw it in washer on permapress lite, then dryer as it needs it as it has so many tears etc on it....please tell me how as i dont want to ruin it! thank you all, and i will get back to you when i can. love ya all lots of hugs Ter
Posts.Title: Ter asked me to post these pics... celia088 deb3girls

Posts.Content: Mar 7, 2008 07:59AM - edited Mar 7, 2008 08:04AM by Ter oh miss Jag, I wish I too could write all the squares w/hearts with such beautiful verses and sayings in each one....I tell you what, some day, I will write each one down and then post it when im thru, how does that sound....as each one is so so special, and yea they made me cry, good tears, knowing they are from you guys..here are just a few as its laying right next to me: 1  True friendship isnt seen with the eyes, it is felt with the heart. 2.  If life Gives you lemons, make lemonade. 3.Friends show their love in times of trouble. 4.  What doesnt destroy me will make me stronger 5 Ghen G*d opened the window of the heaven He asked me: What is your will for today?  "I said:  please take special care of my friend today. 6this one has a black and white pic of 3 beautiful girls, not sure who they are, but look like one of us and it sez:  "you have been my friend, "Replied Caarlette.  "That in itself is a tremendous thing". second row. Friendship isnt a big thing - it's a million little things. cute silly girl with pig tails and sez:  Cancer does not define ME. Hope When we have hope, we discover powers within ourselves we may have never known -- The power to make sacrifices, to endure, to heal, and to love.  Once iwe choose hope, everything is possible. Hope sees the invisible, feels the intangible adn achieves the impossible. - by anonymous Cute litle ghirls with one leg backwards in air, and a flower in her hand:  Ever since then I thought she was amazingand invinceible by Warren 10 years old. When you get to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on. THIRD ROW girl flying with baloons and one in her hand, and sez: Not just survive, THRIVE! Life is not measured by the breath we take, but by the moments that take our breath away. May today there be peace within you.  May you trust G*d that you are exactly where you are meant to be. BE NOT AFRAID..... you know this is Iodine's signature on all her post, as it is from Pope John Paul which is one of my fav quotes. If you dont know where you are going any road will do. a heart, as each one of these sayings are stitched inside a heart, this one sez in a yellow heart:  with a sun with sunglasses, :  Friends are the sunshine of life. FIFTH LINE BOY DIDNT THINK ID GET THIS FAR, IM TIRED..I'LL TRY TO FINISH Unity is strength.  Knowledge is power. and attitude is everything. this one in its hear has 2 girls flying around a globe saying aournd the edges:  There is no distance too far betweeen friends for friendshiip gives wings to the heart. A true friend reaches for your hand and touches your heart We have two options in life both medically and emotionally, give up or fight like hell, there is a boxing glove at the bottom big pink heart that sez:   Choose Hope Let me not pray to be sheltered from dangers.  But to be fearless in facing them.  Let me not beg for the stilling of my pain, but for the heart to conquer it. LAST LINE whoooooo getting tired. A girl with long hair her back side dancing, : sez:   Dance as if no one is watching Friends know the songin your heart adn cab sing it back to you when you've forgotten the words. Faith is not believingv that God can, but that God will. If your alone, Ill be your shadow. If you want to cry,m I will be your shoulder If you wabt a hug, I will be your pillow. If you need to be happy,' I'll be your smile. But anytine you need a friend; Ill just be me. Good friends are like stars... You dont' always see them, but you know they are always there. LAST ONE, ITS AWSOME ITS THE HARRTS WITH A SQUISHY HEART INTO A FACE THAT SEZ ON TOP OF HEART, WITH LOVE, THEN THE FACE IN HEART, AND BOMMON, AS THERE ARE HANDS HOLDING THE HEART, THEN IT SEZ:  FROM YOUR FRIENDS AT bc.oRG.. THE WHOLE THING IS THE MOST PRECIOUS THING I HAVE EVER SEEN  WHEWWWW, THAT WAS A WORK OUT BUT EACH HEART WAS SIG ZAGGED SO PERFECTLY AND THE BACKGROUND ONH FRONT IS ALSO PINK WITH WHITE LETTER THAT SEZ ALL SORTS OF BEAUTIFUL THINGS, AND THE BACK SIDE IS WHITE WITH PINK RIBBONS.....ITS PERFECT HUGS ter

Posts.Content: May 16, 2008 05:03AM Ter wrote: hi oz, I really dont have a solution, as I went 2 winters with no hair..no i didnt use a wig, but sometimes i would wear scarves wheni was out, but at home nohting. right now, with NO treatment for a long time and being on PC, im not sure but im loosing my hair a bit at a time, not gobs but its going, and im not liking it.  Maybe my diet which is not so good, its good when i eat, but within 5-10 min, i run to the potty, and so i am not getting my nutrients i need, and that could be part of it...yes i take meds to stop the diahreah, but it doesnt help....but i try to eat like 1-2 bananas a day and small like crackers with turkey on them, along with one of those fruit cups, as so many times im starving, and yes im loosing so much weight.  my hair use to take long time to dry, NOW, its almost a sinch, and its to my shoulders.... I wish i had an answer for you, just alot of thoughts for you. hugs Ter

Posts.Content: Ter wrote: Hi again, well I was laying here watching ole reruns on TV and just browsing through some stuff on the web, one of my favorite things are Pjs, of many other things, but tonite I found a site that may help quite a few of us who seem to have HOT flashes at nite...well this site has basically all nitewear Pjs and gowns made with a certain material, and they had a few that were on sale, sleeveless plus some that had shorts an top or gowns, and were basic and actually plain and simple, and they are noted basically for women with hot flashes! just thought Id pass it along as we seem to have alot of that around here and with summer on its way, just may make our lifes a bit cooler:   www.serenecomfort.com i know tonite its gonna get a bit chillie, so Im in my "spring" nity, from victoria secret which also has alot of cute nitewear.  This one I had to buy 2 one in pink with black writing and one in black with pink writing..yea it sez victoria sec..but its roomy, not really sleeves but kind of and loose and sooo  comfy, Ive already been wearing it.  They also have tons of other nitewear that are cute and at this time quite a few are 2 for $30, and i always buy one size bigger as when I sleep i love being comfy, take a look there you would be amazed at the cute clothes, they are NOT all hoochie choochie as I use to think, they have really casual clothes and work clothes too.... just keeping up on my "surfing" nite Ter It's better to be effective than it is to be right.- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: HOT FLASHES NO MORE Ter Ter

Posts.Content: Ter wrote: I see my onc tomorrow Thurs..and on friday is my urologist for my kidney, he is very hesitant as my pains im having I thought were from my appendix..kind of strange as thru ALL my surgeries they never once decided to take them...but it wasnt my apendix...my kidney it is, and i go in to surgery this next Tuesday, when i return home I will be by myself, like i am now, as hubby is hospitalized, and for how long, nobody knows....I am almost at point to pay for my sister to be here, but she has a buss to run, she owns and her family etc...but she is such a big help, but she was just here, normally every 3-4 months...and my dear mom in her resthome said I'll be there as i can drive, yikes, as she has her drivers licenses active but should not drive and hasnt , she got rid of her car after her stoke... but what a mother does for her child, no matter how old they get..but NO i will not let her drive, as she is in a wheel chair, and needs asist..whenin her walker... will let you guys know the outcome..if not normally Luanne, or Celia knows whats happening, i spoke to celia tonite she called and she calmed me down quite a bit.  and i know Luanne is not doing so hot these days...and i want her to take care of herself, as i know we all have problems, that need taking care of.. Please G*d take care of all my friends here, as they are such good ladies to one another. hugs Ter It's better to be effective than it is to be right.- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Im frightened. Ter luckywife

Posts.Content: Nov 26, 2007 02:11PM Ter wrote: Thanks Traci for informing us.  I do remember that post and a few others, though I didnt knowI kathy. Im sure she'll meet up with the rest of our angels. Bless her family and Im sorry it took all this for Kathy to be out of pain. Ter
Posts.Title: Another Angel.....Stage4.....Kathy.. Traci-----TripNeg Calico

Posts.Content: Ter wrote: Have you ever enountered anyone that is close to you, that does NOT have or ever had BC or anykind of cancer?  If so, do you see/hear anything negative about YOU having it, ie: not feeling like doing things they do, that you, and your trying to have a good attitude when your at your worse, such as not being able to stand/sit etc, but they think their ideas/suggestions and down right thier sayings and telling you they are right, and have no idea what your going thru?  if so what do you say without starting an arguement, which I know I don't need, as we all know what stress does to to you. I may be wrong but holy cow, Im getting sick of people without knowing anything about BC, or other things i have, think I am so wrong and that I should get up and run day and night, when I know how i will feel afterwards (exhausted, fatigued, and so much in pain), but of course "they are right".. Im still tired etc still and yea the depression sometimes gets worse, especially since the doc when i was admitted in hosp last week told me my cancer has spread to my lungs...as i was sent by ambulance to ER do to chest pains and like in the back of lung pains....NO I dont feel so grand, but according to these people (yes family), one who told me, "what do you want me to do is feel sorry for you", my answer was no, but I see you have no compassion for anything, as she did this to my mom a couple weeks ago while you know my mom is one that has a will to live etc.... what would you say or do? thanks Ter ps, yes i know i blabbler on and on, but i dont think i have this time here..LOL It's better to be effective than it is to be right.- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Have u ever encountered anyones attitude without BC? Ter EnergizerBunny

Posts.Content: Nov 10, 2007 03:53AM Ter wrote: Hi sweetie Luanne, I know we chatted on the phone about this, and you seem so so strong , is that that "army strong"?  he sounds just what we need there, yet i know I would prefere our kids husbands etc come home. you know my heart and soul with thoughts aned prayers will be with him. Welll talk soon, as ive beeen trying to talk to my doc's etc on the botox for fibro... please take care of yourself, and get that rest you need, as I just kind of know you secretely hiding doing chores etc while needing rest....yea your one of those, just like the rest of us, til we cant stand it anymore. love and hugs for all you guys Terrie
Posts.Title: O/T My son is leaving for Iraq LuAnnH mrs_X_Sunneedazee

Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2008 12:21AM Ter wrote: Im in the middle or start of it right now laying in bed, just waitng for time to pass for 10pm so i can take my pain meds. Thanks for letting us know, as Ive seen the commercials on it all this past week. Ter
Posts.Title: Living Proof Movie mimi1030 LuAnnH

Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2008 03:31AM - edited Jan 7, 2008 03:35AM by Ter you wantn me to be honest?  ok we celebrate Hanauka and xmas here in our home. mom in her rest home got out and got us towels,and she shopped herself in her wheel chair, that there was great in itself..just her doing the shopping puts a smile on my face. my son got me a mug, as I need for nothing, a cup from ceramics that has the writing on it:  Queen of Everything!  LOL and dh: got me this ugly ring, as I dont wear jewlery, except my wedding band and I dont cook, and have tons of pots and pans here at moms, all ours are in our storage thing with the rest of our own household..well he got me a huge set of pots and pans......  i hope he exchanges it for a small stereo for me and my Cd's, i love music and its like a morgue in here.I want to hear music! my sis got me tons of food, she knows as i once said "everybody gets food like oranges and beef stick and you know stuff like that, and i never do..so she packed up a huge  box and loaded it with food, like cookies and good stuff, and also sent to hickory farms with cheeses and i love turkey sausage, as i keep getting skinnier each day, as food isnt staying in me..... oh yea my aunt for hanaunka I got a cute pair of Pjs they are winter white with pretty  blue trim and a kangaroo pocket in front..a  bit big, but I didnt have the heart to tell her, so i roll them up and pin them up to fit.. oh yea also a very special bc sister from back in 04 from here sent me the cutest little statue of 2 little girls wearing white tshirts with the pink ribbon on them and its a limited edition called "FRIENDS FOREVER' i spent the day down at my moms and ate in their dinng room with her and her  buddies,  as there is no way i can cook a huge meal, plus dh and my son were sick, dh home in bed and my son at his house sleeping too..but i love the old people at the rest home, as i had made them up not all,  but the ones i know well, little goodie bags with a bag of life savers, the big ones, and ones that are diabetic i got sugar free, and added some small body wash and lotion and cute little clippies to put in their hair...they loved it..... oh i did my own shopping on line and bought myself some new clothes in smaller sizes and a bit up to as im not one for being trendy, but i made good selection and i updated my facial regime with new skin care and nite creams, as i thought it would make me feel better with nice skin again, and i love it,  but yesterday while in tub washing my hair, tub  was full and iwas ready to get out, i didnt have a hold of the bar that helps me in and out and down i went back in the water on my side, banged up my whole side, felt like a whale hitting water as the water splashed all over the bathroom....oy it hurt so bad, but today i only have a few bruises, and NO i cannot tell mom, as she is so worried about me, so remember mums the word. no i am not ungrateful for dh's gifts, but when he says he knows me, then why the pots and pans, ugh, and the ring, its ok, but doesnt even know my size etc....tisk tisk, thats why i did my own shopping on line and got what i really needed, and kind of wanted, but i told everyone NO gifts for me, as all i want to do is get better. and what was nice was i did get some beautiful cards which i love and save from so many here on bc.org..thank you all as i tried to send some out and only got 2 out, one to my cousin and one to my sis... yes im glad the holidays are over, wish the weather would warm up some here in 'calif... and one of the best things i got a PM from someone here today and there from my city, not too far, and that makes me sooo happy, as i havent had anyone close to be with that knows what its like going thru all this BS with BC.  yes that made me happy. lots of hugs to all Ter
Posts.Title: What did you get for Christmas? luckywife dash

Posts.Content: Ter wrote: First of all happy new year to ALL of you here, this is going to be quick as its late and i didnt want to forget.  I found it here in the house and just started reading..its really good and thought most of you would think so too. here is the stuff on it: HOW TO LIVE BETWEEN OFFICE VISITS,   BY BERNIE SIEGEL, MD so far i havent gotten too far but i like it, it doesnt tell you what to do or not, but in laymens terms and others as he and his wife started this group, and they like others inputs, try getting it, i dont think you will be disappointed, im not.... May this new year bring all of you lots of peace and love in your heart, and tons of good health, and that something somewhere can zap this BC etc for all of us and anyone else that it has brutally attacked in so many ways. like always lots of hugs Ter It's better to be effective than it is to be right.- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I found a book i think you'll like Ter Analemma

Posts.Content: Ter wrote: What are my chances after my first masct on R side first, and they removed 18 nodes, 3 possitive, then the 2nd breast a year later, then the mets to the hip, and now im finding that my mets are traveling down my leg almost to my knee. But I was having infections under my R armpit, which my onc put me on antibiotic and said to do warm heat packs, 20 min on and then off, then on...NOW this infection had come back and so i just did the heat packs, which when I told him, he checked it out by feeling, and said I did right..NOW these pains under the arm again keep coming back more frequently, and the pains are getting worse...I do the heat, but w/weather is changing to hot, its mighty hot to do the heat packs, but Im doing them, as I have like the flu...just dont feel good, very tired, very cranky, bad sore throat for almost 2 months, its not real bad but its there and very uncomforable...and if I were to go to my reg doc each time I hurt or my onc I would feel like a real pest..yes i told you my onc wants to run more scans when i feel up to it...and i just don't feel like it, very run down and fatigued, stressed, and yea a cold like with congestion in chest. Been drinking lots of hot tea, and that feels soooo good going down my throat..and with my "eating" habits well ive been trying to eat almsot anything as the other day I was starving, and my diareahaa gets so out of control.  My mom said yeserday on phone has seen me keep loosing weight and said to eat what I can as even everything comes out, she said "there is always " something that stays inside, as im so weak. its 6AM now and I still havent slept yet tonite, trying to get the most of this computer before my box comes from HP to send it back for repairs..and now a good amt of computer problems are not doing what they are doing...and I know im going to be lost w/out it. if you answer to this, I'll ask Celia to check it out or Luanne if they check it out, so i can get some answers due to no comp.   as i really want some answers, and i wish someone would make them for me in Bc org land...as all i want to do is sleep.. oh yea the right arm pit hurts, and is it possible after all they took ,m to come back and grow back cancerous again? : ( thanks so much hugs Ter It's better to be effective than it is to be right.- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Finding more lymphnodes underarm Ter Ter

Posts.Content: May 5, 2008 02:28AM Ter wrote: yea Mary, your right, I do need to see him, though I need to get this kidney stone thing DONE but again the pains in groin from the bladder and kidney, and the kidney pain keeps coming back....and as my onc wanted and needed to do more test like scans...I am not looking forward to any of this, I am really actually have learned to not like but dislike any doctor, as there is always something else to go along with it. Also sleeping all the time, yes the meds, and yes depression quite alot.  I just get so frustrated with so many things, as nothing that comes my way due to health, or legal or my hubby is ever good, i just feel like giving up on the whole thing....as I can stay in bed all day long especially since i have to take my pain meds, they knock me out, and then i feel guillty for doing nothing.....I feel like I dont have a life, and i do have my table out for scrapbooking...but Im so hard on myself that when I do have a bit of energy I make myself do paperwork, as I keep it accumalating..not good..like insurance, the check book and all that.  It was like day lite savings time to me tonite as dh took the comp at the side of bed and moved it in the living room, well needless to say my clock was like an hour later..and for 50 years you could call this one number at any given hour and a nice lady would say "good morning, or afternoon or evening, at the beep the time will be ? Well about almost 2 months ago I called her to reset clocks just to make sure the house clocks were right and all she said "im sorry, after all these years of telling you the time, we have decided to discontinue this time service"....oh man that ticked me off...I bet anything that they will come up with a number that will show up on your phone bill of that nice time lady and charge you for it... ok nowi= im rambling.. nite and hugs Ter
Posts.Title: Finding more lymphnodes underarm Ter Ter

Posts.Content: Feb 2, 2008 12:24AM Ter wrote: oh joni, me too!  Im suppose to do rads to my hip/thighs, and way too scarred, I am going to wait til you get more responses on this...also my arm, left on below the shoulder to below the elbow, all i can think of is rads, and my appt w/onc isnt til march.... hopefully "well" read more on this. I wish us both tons of luck w/responses with your needs and mine. hugs Ter
Posts.Title: Side Effects from Radiation to Hip jonimb Maya1

Posts.Content: Nov 26, 2007 02:04PM Ter wrote: Thanks you guys, you are all correct, and i love the 'comebacks"...you know what gets me is that this cousin who is 2 yrs older than me is a teacher of children who are challanged in all ways, that one day she teaches, changes their pants, feeds them by hand etc etc and yea teaches the most simplist things we take for granted...then the next day, she cant continue to go to next step, she has to go back to square A...I just couldnt believe it, and i brought that up, in a way she might conceive how I am when i wake up each morning with something new.  Or that even prior to bc i might of had a horrible surgery in hosp for a month, then the next month come down with something else....but oh no......she couldntl relate, she thought if i went with her bicycle riding etc etc that i would be all better....by then i was almost chocking or almost wet my pants with laughter, and it doesnt do a bit of good to slam dunk her, as i wasnt raised like that. oh Ravdeb you know of her, no shes not on this site, or probably none.....good thing she just retired, as I could imagine what those poor kids went thru with someone who just waited their time to retire..... Too bad you cant pick your relatives like you can your friends, as our family is shrinking and shrinking. I do consider you guys my family as you do understand, thank you. hugs Ter
Posts.Title: Have u ever encountered anyones attitude without BC? Ter EnergizerBunny

Posts.Content: Jan 23, 2008 12:04AM Ter wrote: Applejax, Just recently I was at my reg doc, as my immune system is so far down, they can barely get a BP out of me, let alone not go to sleep on a ride 2 blocks away...he had done a blood work thing and found out I was very low on Vit C and D...I picked up some C but forgot the D, which I will get when I am not so tired....might want to give it a try as it cant hurt.. Just my 2 cents. Ter

Posts.Content: May 20, 2008 09:02AM Ter wrote: Arc, Yes I do know exactly how you feel, and it doesnt feel too good.  Me with my BC and mets that are now moving down from my hip area, and hubby, well he doesnt have mets, he has another terminal illness which if the treatments we did, Id say 8-10 years and after that helped, still not sure we would be in our situation. So I do understand, completely. my thoughts are with you. hugs Ter
